00087 template <class ClassType>
00088 class DzTCustomClassFactory : public DzClassFactory {
00089 public:
00090     DzTCustomClassFactory( unsigned int id
00091 #ifndef  DSON_IO
00092         , QScriptEngine::ValueOwnership ownership = QScriptEngine::QtOwnership
00093 #endif
00094         ) : 
00095         DzClassFactory( &ClassType::staticMetaObject, DzGuid::fromLegacyClassID( id ) )
00096 #ifndef  DSON_IO
00097         ,m_ownwership( ownership )
00098 #endif
00099     {
00100         s_instance = this;
00101     }
00102 
00103     DzTCustomClassFactory( const DzGuid &guid
00104 #ifndef  DSON_IO
00105         , QScriptEngine::ValueOwnership ownership = QScriptEngine::QtOwnership
00106 #endif
00107         ) : 
00108         DzClassFactory( &ClassType::staticMetaObject, guid )
00109 #ifndef  DSON_IO
00110         ,m_ownwership( ownership )
00111 #endif
00112     {
00113         s_instance = this;
00114     }
00115 
00116 #ifndef  DSON_IO
00117     static QScriptValue objectCreateFromScript( QScriptContext *context, QScriptEngine *engine )
00118     {
00119         if( s_instance )
00120         {
00121             QScriptValue val = engine->newQObject( s_instance->createInstance( context ), s_instance->m_ownwership );
00122             DzClassFactory::registerEnumsOnClass( engine, &ClassType::staticMetaObject, val );
00123             return val;
00124         }
00125         return QScriptValue();
00126     }
00127 
00128     static QScriptValue objectToScript( QScriptEngine *engine, ClassType* const &in )
00129     {
00130         QScriptValue val = engine->newQObject( in );
00131         DzClassFactory::registerEnumsOnClass( engine, &ClassType::staticMetaObject, val );
00132         return val;
00133     }
00134 
00135     static void objectFromScript( const QScriptValue &object, ClassType* &out )
00136     {
00137         out = qobject_cast<ClassType*>( object.toQObject() );
00138     }
00139 
00140     virtual void registerClass( QScriptEngine *engine ) const
00141     {
00142         DzClassFactory::registerClass( engine );
00143         qScriptRegisterMetaType<ClassType*>( engine, objectToScript, objectFromScript );
00144 
00145         QScriptValue ctor = engine->newFunction( objectCreateFromScript );
00146         QScriptValue mo = engine->newQMetaObject( metaObject(), ctor );
00147         engine->globalObject().setProperty( className(), mo );
00148     }
00149 #endif
00150 
00151 protected:
00152     static DzTCustomClassFactory<ClassType> *s_instance;
00153 #ifndef  DSON_IO
00154     QScriptEngine::ValueOwnership                   m_ownwership;
00155 #endif
00156 };

00198 template <class ClassType, class PtrType>
00199 class DzTCustomRefCountedClassFactory : public DzClassFactory {
00200 public:
00201     DzTCustomRefCountedClassFactory( const DzGuid &guid ) : 
00202         DzClassFactory( &ClassType::staticMetaObject, guid )
00203     {
00204         s_instance = this;
00205     }
00206 
00207 #ifndef  DSON_IO
00208     static QScriptValue objectCreateFromScript( QScriptContext *context, QScriptEngine *engine )
00209     {
00210         if( s_instance )
00211         {
00212             QScriptValue val = engine->newQObject( 
00213                 new DzTSharedPointerScriptWrapper<ClassType>(
00214                     qobject_cast<ClassType*>( s_instance->createInstance( context ))),
00215                 QScriptEngine::ScriptOwnership );
00216 
00217             DzClassFactory::registerEnumsOnClass( engine, &ClassType::staticMetaObject, val );
00218             return val;
00219         }
00220         return QScriptValue();
00221     }
00222 
00223     static QScriptValue objectToScript( QScriptEngine *engine, ClassType* const &in )
00224     {
00225         QScriptValue val;
00226         if(in==NULL)
00227         {
00228             val = engine->nullValue();
00229         }
00230         else
00231         {
00232             val = engine->newQObject( new DzTSharedPointerScriptWrapper<ClassType>( in ) );
00233             DzClassFactory::registerEnumsOnClass( engine, &ClassType::staticMetaObject, val );
00234         }
00235         return val;
00236     }
00237 
00238     static void objectFromScript( const QScriptValue &object, ClassType* &out )
00239     {
00240         out = qobject_cast<ClassType*>( object.toQObject() );
00241     }
00242 
00243     static QScriptValue ptrToScript( QScriptEngine *engine, PtrType const &in )
00244     {
00245         QScriptValue val;
00246         if(in==NULL)
00247         {
00248             val = engine->nullValue();
00249         }
00250         else
00251         {
00252             val = engine->newQObject( new DzTSharedPointerScriptWrapper<ClassType>( in ) );
00253             DzClassFactory::registerEnumsOnClass( engine, &ClassType::staticMetaObject, val );
00254         }
00255         return val;
00256     }
00257 
00258     static void ptrFromScript( const QScriptValue &object, PtrType &out )
00259     {
00260         out = qobject_cast<ClassType*>( object.toQObject() );
00261     }
00262 
00263     virtual void registerClass( QScriptEngine *engine ) const
00264     {
00265         DzClassFactory::registerClass( engine );
00266         qScriptRegisterMetaType<ClassType*>( engine, objectToScript, objectFromScript );
00267         qScriptRegisterMetaType<PtrType>( engine, ptrToScript, ptrFromScript );
00268 
00269         QScriptValue ctor = engine->newFunction( objectCreateFromScript );
00270         QScriptValue mo = engine->newQMetaObject( metaObject(), ctor );
00271         engine->globalObject().setProperty( className(), mo );
00272     }
00273 #endif
00274 
00275 protected:
00276     static DzTCustomRefCountedClassFactory<ClassType,PtrType>   *s_instance;
00277 };
